nodes.text: A  royal palace on Lasan housed the planet's royal family. It was protected by the Lasan High Honor Guard, warriors sworn to guard the people of Lasan and the royal family. When the Galactic Empire arrived to exterminate the Lasat, the Honor Guard, led by Captain Garazeb Orrelios, fought to defend the royal palace, but the Empire prevailed and killed most of the planet's inhabitants.
